dialogs:
Well, well. What do we have here?
The only thing I couldn't track:
The Legendary Hero.
I don't know if you've introduced yourself to the others, but I'm Antonio, and I'm dedicated to exploration.

I've traveled through every dimension,
and I know every corner of them.
If you need help finding a place or need to know about a creature, just ask me.

We're really glad you showed up.

Good luck.
